description: Latin absūmere, present active infinitive of absūmō (“diminish”); formed from ab (“from, away from”) + sūmō (“take”).

verbs.description: absume (third-person singular simple present absumes, present participle absuming, simple past and past participle absumed)

entries.meaning: (transitive, obsolete) To consume gradually; to waste away. [Attested from the late 16th century until the mid 18th century.]
